root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-7-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.7 Promote the development, transfer and dissemination of environmentally friendly technologies to developing countries, on favorable terms, including privileged and preferential, mutually agreed upon17.7.1 Total amount of funding approved for developing countries for the promotion of the development, transfer and diffusion of environmentally friendly technologiescategory IIICategory III
